title: Full Stack Developer (React/PHP)
content:

Sounds exciting? Then read on, because weâ€™re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.Requirements:Front-end tech stack:
Experience with a ReactJS ecosystem â€“ (Redux, React-router, React hooks, styled-components, etc.)

Back-end tech stack:
